name: Subway Surfers
description: Dash as fast as you can through the subway in this classic endless runner.

name: Temple Run 2
description: Navigate perilous cliffs, zip lines, mines and forests as you try to escape with the cursed idol.

name: Cut the Rope
description: Feed Om Nom candy in this physics-based puzzle game! Cut ropes, use bubbles, and avoid obstacles.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Slice fruit, avoid bombs! The classic arcade fruit slicer powered by p5.js.

name: Doodle Jump
description: Jump as high as you can! Bounce on platforms and avoid monsters in this addictive vertical platformer.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Tap to fly, avoid pipes! The legendary rage game is back in your browser.
Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! A classic logic puzzle.

name: Snake
description: Classic snake game — eat food, grow longer, don't hit yourself or the walls!

name: Tetris
description: Arrange falling blocks to clear lines. The classic tile-matching puzzle game!

name: Minesweeper
description: Clear the minefield without hitting a mine. A timeless logic game with 3 difficulty levels.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: Play X and O against AI or a friend. Choose easy, medium, hard, or 2-player mode!

name: Wordle
description: Guess the 5-letter word in 6 tries. Green = correct, yellow = wrong spot!

name: Chess
description: Play chess against a friend or the AI. Full rules with castling, en passant & promotion.

name: Sudoku
description: Fill the 9×9 grid so every row, column, and 3×3 box contains 1-9. Three difficulty levels!

name: Sliding Puzzle
description: Rearrange numbered tiles into order by sliding them into the empty space. 3×3, 4×4 & 5×5 grids!

name: Connect Four
description: Drop discs to get four in a row — horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Play vs AI or a friend!

name: Sokoban
description: Push all boxes onto the target spots in this classic warehouse puzzle. 15 challenging levels!

name: Breakout
description: Smash bricks with a bouncing ball! Progressive levels with multi-hit bricks and increasing speed.

name: Space Invaders
description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders! Shoot them down before they reach the bottom.

name: Pac-Man
description: Navigate the maze, eat all dots, and avoid the ghosts! Grab power pellets to turn the tables.

name: Pong
description: The original arcade game! Bounce the ball past your opponent's paddle. Play vs AI or a friend.

name: Solitaire
description: Classic Klondike solitaire — build foundations from Ace to King. Undo, timer & move counter.

name: Memory Match
description: Flip cards and find matching pairs! Test your memory with 4×4, 6×6, or 8×4 grids.

name: Checkers
description: Jump and capture your opponent's pieces. Mandatory jumps, multi-jumps & king promotion!

name: Hangman
description: Guess the word letter by letter before the hangman is drawn! Hints available for each word.

name: Typing Test
description: How fast can you type? Measure your WPM and accuracy with 30s, 60s, or 120s tests.

name: Quiz Game
description: Test your knowledge across General, Science, Technology & History categories. 10 questions per round!

name: Simon
description: Watch the color pattern, then repeat it! How many rounds can you remember? 3 speed modes.

name: Crossword
description: Solve mini crossword puzzles with tech-themed clues. Navigate with keyboard or click!

name: Tower of Hanoi
description: Move all discs from the first peg to the last, one at a time. Never place a larger disc on a smaller one!
